name: Shadow of the Eternals
blurb: Shadow of the Eternals is a third-person action/adventure game steeped in psychological horror, created in collaboration with YOU!

rewards.reward: OFFICIAL SUPPORTER\r\n=============================\r\nMembership to the ORDER OF THE UNSEEN which gives you access to an exclusive section of the official development forums where you have direct interaction with the development team and can contribute content for the game.

EARLY SUPPORTER
=============================
Downloadable copy of SHADOW OF THE ETERNALS for PC or Wii U.  Access to in-game hidden room called WHATELEY’S SECRET STUDY, containing special weapons, spells and items to aid you on your journey.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access

PRE-ORDER SUPPORTER
=============================
Downloadable copy of SHADOW OF THE ETERNALS for PC or Wii U.  Access to in-game hidden room called WHATELEY’S SECRET STUDY, containing special weapons, spells and items to aid you on your journey.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access

DUAL PACK SUPPORTER
=============================
Includes TWO downloadable copies of SHADOW OF THE ETERNALS for PC, Wii U or one of each.  Share one with a friend or have a copy for each platform.   Access to in-game hidden room called WHATLEY’S SECRET STUDY, containing special weapons, spells and items to aid you on your journey.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access

AUDIO SUITE SUPPORTER
=============================
Receive a digital download to the ORIGINAL GAME SOUNDTRACK and a digital download to WHATELEY’S RECORDINGS narrated by the mysterious man himself.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study

GAME ENHANCEMENT SUPPORTER
=============================
Receive a powerful, enchanted TYRANNUS’ GLADIUS in-game weapon which curses the wielder with immortality.  Change the appearance of playable characters Klára and Becker with new PLAYER OUTFITS.  
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study

BOX SUPPORTER
=============================
Includes physical box copy of SHADOW OF THE ETERNALS for PC.  Also includes a digital copy of the game for PC or Wii U.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study

DIGITAL SUITE SUPPORTER
=============================
Digital book, THE ART OF SHADOW OF THE ETERNALS, containing character concepts, sketches, screenshots and wallpapers.  You also receive the combined rewards from AUDIO SUITE and GAME ENHANCEMENT SUPPORTER.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes

BETA SUPPORTER
=============================
Access to the BETA on PC.  Your name appears in the CREDITS under “Special Thanks to these Kickstarter Supporters”
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book

COLLECTORS SUPPORTER
=============================
Includes a physical box copy collector’s edition of SHADOW OF THE ETERNALS for PC.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits

CODEX SUPPORTER
=============================
Signed and numbered copy of the EPHEMERAL CODEX, a 200 page high quality color volume packed with design documents, concept art, sketches, notes and Shadow of the Eternals lore.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits

ARTISAN SUPPORTER
=============================
Your own PERSONAL DOSSIER and photograph added in the game.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits + Ephemeral Codex

INSCRIBED SUPPORTER
=============================
A large ROYALTY-STYLE PORTRAIT of you within the game and a PHYSICAL PRINT of your in-game portrait.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits + Ephemeral Codex + Personal Dossier

MENTI SUPPORTER
=============================
Work with Precursor to add YOUR CONTENT IN THE GAME such as a sanity event, art, music or a storyline.  Receive an ASSOCIATE GAME DESIGNER CREDIT
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits + Ephemeral Codex + Personal Dossier + Royalty-Style Portrait

CHAMPION SUPPORTER
=============================
Work with Precursor to DEMO THE GAME AT AN EVENT like E3 (Los Angeles), PAX (Seattle), or GDC (San Francisco).  Must be able to arrange travel to the location.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits + Ephemeral Codex + Personal Dossier + Royalty-Style Portrait + Your Content in the Game + Associate Game Designer Credit

ETERNAL SUPPORTER
=============================
VISIT PRECURSOR GAMES and ATTEND PRIVATE LAUNCH EVENT.  You will also receive an EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT and your PERSONAL BIO will be added to our team page. Must be able to arrange travel to the location.
=============================
Also Includes: Forum Access + The Game + Whateley’s Secret Study + Soundtrack + Whateley’s Recordings + Tyrannus’ Gladius + Alternate Costumes + Digital Art Book + Beta Access + Special Thanks Credits + Ephemeral Codex + Personal Dossier + Royalty-Style Portrait + Your Content in the Game + Associate Game Designer Credit + Demo the Game at an Event
